channel.title: All Battlescape Coders Read!
channel.description:
I downloaded Battlescape. I changed the port to 43594 in server.java then I went to client to client.java and changed 127.0.0.1 to my no-ip. When I tried logging in threw the no-ip I get error connecting to server. I am using a different source and it's working fine so I don't think it's a portforwarding issue.
Someone please help! I really want Battlescape to work.

item.title: All Battlescape Coders Read!
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

If others can connect it’s because your router’s NAT table doesn’t support loopbacking to your external address. No need to try and connect from outside of your own network anyways if you have it running on a computer inside your network. If others can’t connect, You have probably port forwarded incorrectly.

Read full topic
